properties.Proposed_m: Since it is an urban area, it is a densely populated area. There is no enough space to follow soil conservation practices.
properties.Contributi: Appropriate actions should be taken by RDA

properties.Proposed_m: In an area where houses are built above the road. The banks have been cut vertically during the construction of the road. Houses are damaged as banks collapse during the rainy season.
properties.Contributi: Appropriate actions should be taken by RDA
